title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 117.1 - New York State personal income tax treatment of partnership income generally
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 117.1 - New York State personal income tax treatment of partnership income generally

State Regulations
A partnership itself does not pay a New York State
personal income tax, but the individual partners are taxed on their respective
distributive shares of the partnership income, whether or not such shares are
actually distributed to them. As to nonresident partners, see Part 137 of this

Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
117.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
